form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-4 (Rev. 9-1-78) N

full_text: FILE REQUESTED Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 by NN Date 10/19/60 A34 140 438 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-R0079 FEE STAMP WI APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION Mail or take to: IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN REGISTRATION (Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name MAN TANG TYPE.) Section of Law (Leave Blank) D31.6607 No. A34 140 438 Date: P.O. (1) My full true and correct name is Box MAN TANG (2) I now live at. 916 XTH/ST.) PARKER Yumo A2. (Full true name without abbreviations) Srave 8 25 SUN (Number and street City seator zip Add I was born on in MU- MING KWONG TONG CHINA (Month) (Day) Year (City or town) County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to (5) Other names I have used are: NONE (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) My father's name TO CHUCK FUN TANG (7) My mother's maiden name YET (8 Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (9) Can you read and write English? (A.LITTLE) Yes No (10) Can you speak English? (A LITTLE) Yes No (11) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (12) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 3 20 1974 under the name of MAN TANG C (Month) (Day) (Year) at SAN FRANCISCO, CAL. on PAN AMERICA AIR LINES 846 City) (State) (Name of ship, airline or adjustment of status) (13) Since that date I have resided continuously in the United States and continuously in the State of A2.1 where \now live since 1974 During the last five years I have been physically present in the United States for a total of 60 months. 6/2 (14) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) APR.1974 19 PRESENT TIME 916 7TH ST. PARKE AZ. 85344 (b) 19 19 (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 (15) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES 7Eb8 1977 APR 1977 WESTBRN AIR LINES PHOENIX A2. AUG 21 1977 LEPT22,1977 WESTERN AIR LINES PHOENIX A2. FEb 91978 APP.21 1978 WESTERN AIR LINES PHOENIY A2. To be Cont. (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH YOU UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES 72b 7 1976 AUG 1976 PAN AMERICA AIR LINE LOS BAGELES No others DNO.A (16) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: Form N-400 (Rev. 9-1-78) N (1) for / yr (OVER)
